summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney regarding the review of documents related to Tartaglione in the context of an Epstein FOIA request. It appears to be internal DOJ correspondence about document processing.

persons.name: Jason
persons.context: Appears as the recipient of an email from an Assistant United States Attorney regarding document review.

locations.context: Office address of the Assistant United States Attorney.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated April 12, 2021, concerning the review of Tartaglione documents in an Epstein FOIA request.
It originates from an Assistant United States Attorney in White Plains, NY.
The correspondence indicates ongoing FOIA-related document review processes within the DOJ regarding the Epstein case.
